thread.title: Three of the latest credit card airport lounge access offers
thread.title_full: Three of the latest credit card airport lounge access offers

title: Three of the latest credit card airport lounge access offers
text:
Three of the latest credit card airport lounge access offers The National staff Best buy 
Lounge access in Dubai and Abu Dhabi with ADCB 
Benefits: Present your ADCB Privilege Club or Excellency debit card at Al Reem lounge in Abu Dhabi International Airport or any Marhaba lounge in Dubai Airport and enjoy free access for up to four hours per day. The offer also allows two children below 12 free entry when they are accompanied by the cardholder. 
Beware of: This offer is not valid on the Easy Pay debit card or Smart debit card. 
Worldwide airport lounge access with CBD 
Benefits: Get access to 700 Visa Lounges around the world with the CBD World MasterCard. The cardholder can also enjoy savings of 12 per cent on first, business and economy class fares with Etihad Airways and receive travel insurance on any bookings made on the card. Beware of: Applicants must earn Dh100,000 a month and have a minimum of six months’ service with their current employer. 
Five Middle East lounges with Mashreq 
Benefits: Present your Mashreq Smart Saver Titanium card or Mashreq Platinum Elite MasterCard and enjoy access to five airport lounges across the Middle East. These include the Marhaba lounges in Dubai International Airport, the Pearl Lounge in Kuwait International Airport, VIP lounges in Cairo and lounges in Saudi Arabia and Jordan. Beware of: The access is offered only to the cardholder.
